description: This file defines a Flutter widget for displaying notifications in a mobile application. It manages fetching notifications via a service, handles loading and error states, and renders a list of notifications with read/unread indicators.

classes.name: NotificationsScreen
classes.description: A StatefulWidget that displays a list of user notifications.

classes.name: _NotificationsScreenState
classes.description: State class managing the notifications list, loading state, and UI rendering.

methods.name: _load
methods.description: Fetches notifications using the NotificationsService, updates UI based on success or failure.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the UI based on current state: loading indicator, error message, or notifications list.
